channel.title: Carmentae Infrastructure Management
channel.description: Recent content on Carmentae Infrastructure Management

item.title: Asset management for railway infrastructures
item.description: Project overview Infrastructure managers require indicators to obtain a view of 1) how their asset management process is working, and 2) how much work will be required in the future. These indicators provide infrastructure managers with information as to how they can improve, and ensure that they continue to provide the expected service increasingly efficiently and effectively. Carmentae’s deliverables item item item Year 2020 - ongoing Client Basler Verkehrs-Betriebe

item.title: Dr. Clemens Kielhauser
item.description: advanced numerical modeling, uncertainty quantification and reliability assessment of engineering systems. He is currently co-managing director of Eracons and senior researcher/lecturer at TU München. Jürgen studied civil engineering and infrastructure management and received his PhD from ETH Zürich in 2019. His areas of expertise include computational modelling, uncertainty quantification as well as risk and resilience assessment of infrastructure systems. He is co-founder of Carmentae and Assistant Professor for Complex Infrastructure Systems at the University of Liverpool.
